column4: hello... im having problems with gdm and user switch... can some one help me?

no one?
it does that automaticly
use switch_user
that happens becuz u used switch user at the first place
if u completely log out the first user before u log in with the second one, it wont happen

and then it ask me to enter the password for user1

just press that button and u r back to gdm
